name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior FullStack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing high-quality, scalable applications utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **TailwindCSS**. Proven expertise in designing and implementing **APIs**, automation solutions, and data pipelines to optimize **AI** and **LLM** functionalities, including integration with **OpenAI** and **Anthropic** for image and audio generation. Skilled in enhancing user experience through responsive design and UI/UX best practices. Experienced in deploying and managing applications on **Vercel** and utilizing **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase** for database management. Adept at handling asynchronous operations and job queues in a fast-paced environment. Strong background in **cloud-native architectures** and automation for backend systems, with a successful track record at leading organizations like VISA and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed robust web applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React** to enhance user interfaces and improve overall performance.
Engineered serverless solutions with **Next.js** and deployed using **Vercel** to optimize application delivery and scalability, accommodating over **50,000** monthly users.
Implemented responsive design principles with **TailwindCSS** to ensure seamless experiences across devices, achieving a **30%** increase in user engagement.
Leveraged **AI** technologies, specifically **OpenAI** and **Anthropic**, to enhance application features like **image generation** and **audio generation**, streamlining user interactions.
Architected data pipelines utilizing **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase** to efficiently manage and automate data processing needs, reducing data retrieval times by **25%**.
Utilized **Git** for version control and collaboration across **10+** team members, ensuring code quality and consistency in a rapid development environment.
Designed and implemented **APIs** for third-party integrations that enhanced the application's functionality and user experience, resulting in a **15%** increase in service adoption.
Fostered the development of **async operations** and **job queues** to streamline backend processes, improving application response time by **20%**.

Designed and developed responsive web applications in **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** using **React** and **Next.js**, ensuring seamless user experiences across devices.
Implemented serverless architecture with **Vercel** to optimize deployment processes, achieving a **30%** reduction in load times.
Created data pipelines for automation tasks and managed job queues with **async operations**, ensuring efficient processing and scalability for handling high traffic loads.
Engineered dynamic user interfaces with **TailwindCSS** while collaborating with cross-functional teams to enhance **UI/UX** in a fast-paced environment.
Integrated third-party **APIs** to enable features such as image and video generation, enhancing application capabilities while simplifying development processes.
Employed **Git** for version control in software projects and championed best practices for code reviews, leading to a **20%** improvement in code quality during a specific release cycle.
Optimized applications for better performance and alignment with AI capabilities, focusing on **AI optimization** strategies and exploring various **vector databases**.
Leveraged cloud technologies such as **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase** for efficient data management and storage, ensuring data integrity and availability across applications.

Designed and developed robust web applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Next.js**, ensuring user-centric interfaces with responsive design and **TailwindCSS**.
Engineered efficient data pipelines and managed backend services with **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase**, enhancing data management for trading and financial applications.
Integrated **automation** and **async operations** to streamline serverless functions on **Vercel**, improving deployment efficiency by up to **30%**.
Implemented complex **APIs** for seamless communication between frontend and backend components, ensuring high reliability and performance under load.
Designed and established job queues and scheduling mechanisms using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, achieving backend process optimization and reducing task completion time by **40%**.
Employed AI optimization techniques and frameworks such as **OpenAI** and **Anthropic**, introducing advanced features like **image generation** and **audio generation** into the application stack.
Maintained a fast-paced development environment by applying best practices in version control using **Git**, fostering collaborative team efforts in project delivery timelines.
